results.title: Tales of "S" - bend it, knot it, twist it
abstracts: This book, published by Civica Pte Ltd, is a collection of 25 short stories written by primary and secondary school students in Singapore. The stories are adaptations from well-known fairy tales.

results.title: Tales of "S" - old stories, new voices!
abstracts: This book, published by Civica Pte Ltd, is a collection of 32 short stories written by primary and secondary school students in Singapore. The stories are adaptations from well-known tales.

results.title: Canine Messiah
abstracts: This is a short story written by a teenager that surrounds a boy named Gloss Atnuth and the wolf, Thiombora.

results.title: Above and below ground
abstracts: This is a short story written by a teenager about the battle between the Royal Army of Alluden and the rebelling underground Resistance Force.

results.title: 新蕾奖 : 第十八届全国中学生华文创作比赛作品集
abstracts: 《新蕾奖》是由新加坡福建会馆出版的, 是一本中学生华文作文比赛获奖文章结集, 供给其他学生参考并提升作文水准. 这是新蕾奖2020, 作文题目包括了甘榜与组屋, 花园城市的故事, 我国居家隔离前后, 新冠肺炎来袭的新加坡今昔, 走过两个时代的人, 新加坡——在那新与旧之间 优秀创作作品.

results.title: 作文群英. 20 : 新加坡福建会馆属校小学生华文作文比赛得奖作品
abstracts: 《作文群英》是由新加坡福建会馆出版, 是一本小学生华文作文比赛获奖文章结集, 供给其他学生参考并提升作文水准. 这是第20本, 收录了四年级和五年级的优秀创作作品.

results.title: In the shoes of a Cambodian child
abstracts: This book, published by Goducate Ltd, contains a collection of stories written by the children in the Goducate Children's Home in Cambodia.

results.title: How the hungry T-Rex got fixed
abstracts: This is the first book written by four-year-old Marcus Loo Cua, about how he defeated a T-Rex, which had threatened to eat his family.

results.title: Powerful proposals : how to give your business the winning edge / David G. Pugh and Terry R. Bacon.
abstracts: "Powerful Proposals presents a step-by-step plan for creating informative, engaging documents that satisfy your clients' needs and feature the solutions your firm can provide. It's an invaluable tool for winning contracts in any market."--Jacket.
